entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
